AIConfiguration.msdyn_customconfiguration:
{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-1","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"Please conduct a comprehensive and unbiased assessment of this Power Apps functionality in relation to this organizational objective. Your assessment should be structured to prioritise and ensure objectivity and depth of analysis.

On a scale of 0 > 5, with 0 indicating no alignment and 5 indicating perfect alignment, rate how well the power app aligns with the organizational objective. Consider specific criteria, such as the app's contribution to objective, and its strategic alignment. Be very impartial, critical and you absolutely must avoid favoring alignment where it does not exist. This is crucial. Do not seek alignment without concrete evidence. Rate the impact the Power App has against the objective using a scale of 0 > 5. Be impartial and only assign a high-score if there is clear evidence of strong impact. Do not prioritise tangible benefit over intangible, only define the type of benefit if criteria are met.

Identify any areas where the app may not align well with objectives.
Be sure to edit and review your response for clarity and objectivity.
Please adhere to these guidelines to ensure a comprehensive, unbiased, and objective assessment of the power app's performance. Your insights will play a crucial role in informing our decisions regarding the app's role in achieving our organizational objectives. Thank you for your diligence and objectivity in this assessment.

Please format the response in JSON with the following properties:
- Objective title
- Alignment to objective (0 > 5)
- Impact (0 > 5)
- Impact type (must be tangible, intangible)
- Actual impact contribution: number (only if available)
- Actual impact contribution measure: (only if available must be %, number, scale, time, qty)
- Summary (MUST limit to 80 words)
- Confidence in assessment (0 > 10)

[Start of topic]
Story: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"OriginalStory","text":"OriginalStory"},{"type":"literal","text":"
Objective title: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ObjectiveTitle","text":"ObjectiveTitle"},{"type":"literal","text":"
Objective description: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ObjectiveDescription","text":"ObjectiveDescription"},{"type":"literal","text":"
Objective measure of success: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"MeasurableComponent","text":"MeasurableComponent"},{"type":"literal","text":"
[End of topic]"}]}

{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-1","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"Please conduct a comprehensive and unbiased assessment of this Power Apps functionality in relation to this organizational objective. Your assessment should be structured to ensure objectivity and depth of analysis.

On a scale of 0 > 5, with 0 indicating no alignment and 5 indicating perfect alignment, rate how well the power app aligns with the organizational objective. Consider specific criteria, such as the app's contribution to objective, and its strategic alignment. Be very impartial, critical and avoid favoring alignment where it does not exist. This is crucial. Do not seek alignment without concrete evidence. Rate the impact the Power App has against the objective using a scale of 0 > 5. Be impartial and only assign a high-score if there is clear evidence of strong impact. Look for, and decide if the alignment is adding tangible or intangible value.

Identify any areas where the app may not align well with objectives.
Be sure to edit and review your response for clarity and objectivity.
Please adhere to these guidelines to ensure a comprehensive, unbiased, and objective assessment of the power app's performance. Your insights will play a crucial role in informing our decisions regarding the app's role in achieving our organizational objectives. Your diligence and objectivity in this assessment is essential.
From the functionality that you are assessing, you should also create a single sentence, under 100 characters that defines the most critical impact this app has. This sentence must encapsulate the highest value that the app is having toward the strategic objective.

Please format the response in JSON with the following properties:
- Objective title
- Alignment to objective (0 > 5)
- Impact (0 > 5)
- Impact type (must be tangible, intangible)
- Actual impact contribution: number (only if available)
- Actual impact contribution measure: (only if available must be %, number, scale, time, qty)
- Summary (MUST limit to 80 words)
- Confidence in assessment (0 > 10)
- Key value statement (MUST limit to 90 characters)

[Start of topic]
Story: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"EnhancedStoryText","text":"EnhancedStoryText"},{"type":"literal","text":"
Objective title: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ObjectiveTitle","text":"ObjectiveTitle"},{"type":"literal","text":"
Objective description: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ObjectiveDescription","text":"ObjectiveDescription"},{"type":"literal","text":"
Objective measure of success: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ObjectiveMeasureOfSuccess","text":"ObjectiveMeasureOfSuccess"},{"type":"literal","text":"
 
[End of topic]
"}]}

{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-1","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"You are a skilled storyteller tasked with expanding a citizen developer's narrative about their Power App. Your goal is to create a comprehensive, engaging, and vivid account of their experience. Imagine you are turning their initial story into a feature article for a business magazine. Please read the initial story below and then craft a compelling, HTML formatted narrative that deeply explores the following elements, with the title of the story being "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"StoryTitle","text":"StoryTitle"},{"type":"literal","text":", formatted as a H1 HTML element: 1.

The problem

(Approximately 900 words): Dive into the problem or need that sparked the creation of the Power App. Explore the pain points, inefficiencies, and challenges the organization faced. Paint a detailed picture of the situation that demanded innovative solutions. 2.

App maker background - "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"AppMakerFullName","text":"AppMakerFullName"},{"type":"literal","text":"

(Approximately 300 words): Immerse the reader in the world of the citizen developer. Provide an in-depth background that showcases their role, expertise, and prior experiences that uniquely positioned them to take on the challenge of creating the Power App. Do not seek background information where it does not exist. 3.

Low-code journey

(Approximately 500 words): Embark on a journey of skill acquisition. Unveil the resources, strategies, and pivotal moments that defined the citizen developer's learning curve. Do not create content that did not exist in the original story. 4.

Obstacles and challenges

(Approximately 400 words): Navigate through the complexities of change management. Delve into the resistance, adaptations, and collaborations that marked the integration of the Power App into the organization. Highlight the strategies used to overcome challenges and foster acceptance. 5.

The value in the solution

(Approximately 900 words): Showcase the transformational outcomes of the Power App. Provide concrete examples of how the app revolutionized processes, workflows, or user experiences. Quantify the impact with measurable metrics where feasible. 6.

What's next?

(Approximately 600 words): Demonstrate a mindset of continuous improvement by sharing the plans for the future of the application. Your task is to create an immersive and captivating narrative that captures the essence of the citizen developer's journey. Expand, elaborate, and embellish each section while maintaining the authenticity of the original story. The final HTML-formatted narrative should be detailed, engaging, and informative, resembling a feature article that captivates readers. [Start of topic] "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"OriginalStory","text":"OriginalStory"},{"type":"literal","text":" [End of topic]"}]}
